name.leadingSpace: Name should not begin with empty spaces
name.trailingSpace: Name should not end with empty spaces
name.tooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters long
name.invalidCharacters: Name should only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes
name.multipleSpaces: Name should not contain multiple consecutive spaces
name.startsWithSpecial: Name should not start with a hyphen or apostrophe
name.endsWithSpecial: Name should not end with a hyphen or apostrophe

zhongkao.title: 成都市中考模拟志愿填报
